Vista 
 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢  AMD has delivered a single unified graphics driver for both Windows 7 and

New AMD Display Library (ADL) SDK 
 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢  AMD Display Library (ADL) SDK is designed to access display driver functionality for all ATI Radeon graphics accelerators and FirePro graphics accelerators  

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢  The SDK supports Windows XP, Windows Vista and Linux  - 32 and 64 bit variants  

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢  The SDK can be used from both unmanaged (C/C++) and managed (C#) applications 
- samples are provided within the SDK  

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢  The ADL SDK is available to the public via the Developer relations site

Known Issues Under the Windows 7 Operating System 
 
The following section provides a summary of open issues that may be experienced under the Windows 7 operating system in the latest version of CatalystÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¾Ã‚Â¢.
